text: Piergiuseppe Scardigli (October 13, 1933 - May 27, 2008) was an Italian medievalist and Germanic studies scholar. He was Professor of Germanic philology at the University of Florence. Scardigli specialized in the study early Germanic culture, literature and language. ==Selected works== * Lingua e storia dei Goti, 1964 ==References== *Patrizia Lendinara, Fabrizio D.
